name: Blaze
description: Blaze is a web3 live-streaming platform where creators truly own their audience, content and income. Blaze enables wallet-native subscriptions, donations and on-chain payouts, without intermediaries. Streamers can mint clips or broadcasts as NFTs, while viewers earn from platform fees through a community-driven “StreamerFi” economy. The goal is simple: to build a decentralized, creator-owned future for live streaming.
